profile.name: Marcelo Santos
profile.headline: Software Engineer & Founder @ Monynha Softwares
profile.bio: Software engineer focused on digital products, automation, and DevOps. Passionate about accessibility, open source, and inclusive design. Founder of Monynha Softwares ‚Äî a creative lab that blends technology, diversity, and digital art.

projects.name: BotecoPro
projects.summary: Management system for bars and restaurants with AI to streamline operations and boost efficiency.
projects.fullDescription: BotecoPro centralises bar and restaurant operations with automated ordering, inventory management, and real-time dashboards. The AI layer recommends preventive actions, reduces waste, and empowers teams to deliver consistent service experiences.

projects.name: FACODI
projects.summary: Community Digital College ‚Äî an open, free education platform focused on social inclusion.
projects.fullDescription: FACODI democratises access to higher education through interactive tracks, curated content, and community support tools. The platform prioritises accessibility, low-bandwidth connectivity, and collaborative governance.

projects.name: MonynhaTech
projects.summary: Technical blog and multilingual documentation hub for the company.
projects.fullDescription: MonynhaTech gathers technical notes, tutorials, and the architectural vision behind Monynha products. The multilingual curation ensures global teams can follow decisions, design standards, and integrations with the official stack.

projects.name: Art Leo
projects.summary: Artistic portfolio and playground for creative showcases.
projects.fullDescription: Art Leo features digital storytelling, 3D sculptures, and interactive experiences built with React Three Fiber. The project celebrates LGBTQIAP+ artists and keeps performance optimised for mobile devices and augmented reality.

projects.name: AssisTina
projects.summary: AI virtual assistant for customer support and process automation.
projects.fullDescription: AssisTina combines language models, automation flows, and omnichannel integrations to help clients quickly and empathetically. The solution learns from human feedback and keeps auditable trails for responsible AI governance.

projects.name: MonaDocs
projects.summary: Technical documentation template for Monynha portals and products.
projects.fullDescription: MonaDocs provides a sleek static foundation for documentation portals with advanced Markdown support, shadcn/ui components, and continuous integration with the Monynha design system.

projects.name: Monynha.com (Corporate)
projects.summary: Corporate website for Monynha Softwares with branding and company information.
projects.fullDescription: The institutional site consolidates the manifesto, value propositions, and contact channels for Monynha Softwares. Its architecture prioritises performance, AA accessibility, and storytelling aligned with the institutional dossier.

projects.name: Infra Hub (Monynha Online)
projects.summary: Central infrastructure hub for Monynha Online powered by Coolify.
projects.fullDescription: Infra Hub orchestrates pipelines, monitoring, and automated deployments with Coolify and isolated containers. The observability layer keeps public and private Monynha experiences stable.

projects.name: Open WebUI
projects.summary: Open WebUI instance for local and hosted AI experiments.
projects.fullDescription: Monynha's Open WebUI instance makes it easy to experiment safely with local models and hosted services. The environment integrates with Infra Hub and follows privacy policies for agent training and testing.

projects.name: Marcelo Portfolio
projects.summary: Personal portfolio and professional site for Marcelo M7.
projects.fullDescription: Marcelo's portfolio showcases projects, manifestos, and authorial studies within the Monynha visual language. It is built as a living lab for new interactions, advanced accessibility, and components from the internal design system.

highlights: Built and maintain the Monynha ecosystem (sites, apps, and automations).
Full-stack development with Next.js, Supabase, Flutter, and Payload CMS.
Lead CI/CD pipelines (Coolify, GitHub Actions) and Docker infrastructure.
Blend art, technology, and AI to create inclusive digital products.
BSc in Software Engineering and Information Technologies.
Practical projects in AI, web development, and data visualisation.
Participation in open-source initiatives and applied research.

series.title: Creative Systems
series.description: Collection of experimental projects exploring the intersection of generative art, UX, and intelligent automation.

artworks.title: Art Leo Creative Spaces
artworks.description: Immersive experience built with Next.js and React Three Fiber for artist Leonardo Silva, highlighting interactive art and 3D environments.

thoughts.title: Inclusive Design & Technology
thoughts.excerpt: Technology is more human when it is accessible.
thoughts.body: I believe design and accessibility are not opposites but allies. Within the Monynha ecosystem, every interface is born with empathy: proper contrast, keyboard navigation, and respect for prefers-reduced-motion are part of our digital DNA.

thoughts.title: Behind Monynha
thoughts.excerpt: More than software, it is a movement.
thoughts.body: Monynha Softwares was born from the desire to unite diversity and technology with a single purpose: create tools that empower people and transform ideas into accessible, creative, fabulous digital experiences üíÖ.
